name: The Jog That Saved Christmas
description:
after Santa's bag malfunctions and drops the presents and who knows into who knows where, its up to you, the worlds fastest jogger, must run around bouncing the presents back into the bag, making sure nothing hits the floor, and not getting bad things into the bag.

Tutorial:

Player -  A/< to move left and D/> to move right
Bag - Mouse to move

get the green outlined items into the bag, don't let the red items get in, and don't let anything touch the ground
